name: Hoverslam
description:
Controls

Space - Continue / Boost on
R - Restart
Q - Level select / score.

Instructions

Press and hold 'Space' to turn ON your rockets. Try to safely land the ship on the platforms and avoid obstacles.

Careful -- You only have three rockets. Get maximum score by quickly completing the level. For hardcore players, keep more boosters on the ship for even higher scores. Be sure to pick up sweet $$ along the way.

Info

Entry for the Nokia Jam 3 (2021) - theme "ON / OFF"

Game by William Goddard and James Goddard
